sense.def:
An excuse
je razlog, ki ga navedemo, da bi pojasnili, zakaj je bilo nekaj storjeno, ni bilo storjeno ali ne bo storjeno.

seg.quote: There is no excuse for this happening in a new building.

sense.def:
To excuse oneself
ali
to excuse something
pomeni povedati, zakaj smo storili nekaj slabega, v poskusu, da bi se branili.

seg.quote: The Vice-President admitted taking bribes, excusing it as a momentary weakness.

sense.def:
To excuse someone
pomeni odpustiti nekomu nekaj slabega, kar je storil.

seg.quote: I excused him much of his prejudice.

sense.def:
To excuse someone from a duty or responsibility
pomeni rešiti nekoga neke dolžnosti ali odgovornosti.

seg.quote: ...a certificate excusing him from games at school.

sense.def:
Če nekomu rečemo:
excuse me
, ga prosimo, naj nam dovoli oditi.

Excuse me
rečemo, kadar hočemo pritegniti pozornost nekega človeka, ker mu želimo postaviti vprašanje.

seg.quote: Excuse me, but is there a fairly cheap restaurant near here?

sense.def:
Excuse me
rečemo tudi, preden nekoga popravimo.

seg.quote: Excuse me, but I think you have misunderstood.

sense.def:
Excuse me
rečemo tudi, kadar se želimo opravičiti, ker nekoga vznemirimo ali prekinemo, ali če naredimo nekaj nevljudnega, na primer rignemo.
